overview: Andrews is responsible for leading Sabaâ€™s overall operations in Asia Pacific, EMEA, Japan and Latin America. Prior to joining Saba, Andrews was senior vice president and chief operating officer of the NetIQ Business Unit at Attachmate Corporation. Andrews joined NetIQ in 2003 as vice president of NetIQ EMEA where he grew revenues significantly year over year. He also served in several other executive roles at NetIQ, including senior vice president and general manager worldwide field operations and chief operating officer until the company was acquired by Attachmate. Prior to NetIQ, Marc held several senior executive roles at leading high technology companies, including BMC software in EMEA, as well as senior sales executive positions at Novell and Hi Performance Systems.

milestones.description: Andrews appointed at Micro Focus as President
